keyanshu.gariba@gmail.com:
I hope this email finds you well. My name is Keyanshu Gariba, and I am a Master's student in Software Engineering at Northeastern University with a strong background in full-stack development and scalable systems. I was excited to come across the opportunity at craz7, as my skills align closely with your requirements.

With experience in Flutter (Dart), React.js, Node.js, and backend development using Spring Boot, I’ve built cross-platform applications and optimized databases like PostgreSQL and MongoDB. At Creomutus Designs, I developed a unified database system using Java and REST APIs, reducing redundancy by 40%. Additionally, my work on the MERN-based "Luggshare" platform demonstrates my ability to build scalable web and mobile solutions.

I’d love the chance to contribute to your mission of revolutionizing civic tech. Thank you for your time and consideration. Looking forward to connecting further.
